Member Function Documentation

virtual bool icomp::IComponentEnvironmentManager::ConfigureEnvironment ( const istd::CString &  configFilePath = istd::CString()  )  [pure virtual]

Configure environment for specified file path.

If this file path is invalid or empty, standard configuration file will be used.

Implemented in icomp::CEnvironmentManagerBase, and iqt::CPackagesLoaderComp.

virtual istd::CString icomp::IComponentEnvironmentManager::GetConfigFilePath (  )  const [pure virtual]

Get file path of real used config file.

If no config file was used, it returns empty string.

Implemented in icomp::CEnvironmentManagerBase, and iqt::CPackagesLoaderComp.
